name: dryad
description: You would have thought this was a tree until it moved.  It is human-shaped and human-sized, but with wood for skin and leaves for hair.  It regards you impassively.

name: brackenwight
description: An animate pile of moss, leaves, sticks, and other forest detritus, towering almost three metres high.  Three pits near the top with a lambent green glow might be eyes.  It slowly walks on massive limbs.

death_function.message: %s collapses into a massive pile of leaves and sticks.
